title: Vegelicia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Buffet, Taiwanese
description: 綠蔬, at 台北市羅斯福路3段283巷21號1樓, was established originally in spring 2013 and re-opened again in early-2015. It's a buffet style vegetarian restaurant near the university. Some items, particularly desserts, contain egg and/or dairy so ask if you're vegan. Sells takeaway snacks, vegetable buns, and sauces. Has afternoon tea. The owners' mission is to promote vegetarianism through good food.
streetAddress: 21, Sec. 3, Lane 283, Luo Tse Fu Rd
